data.text: Ah, a poster about the festival. And they've got fireworks too.
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, a poster about the festival. And they've got fireworks too.

data.text:
There's a rumor that if you head in to the mountains from 
here, you can also find a place to see fireflies.
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿There's a rumor that if you head in to the mountains from 
󠁿here, you can also find a place to see fireflies.

data.text:
I want to go but…… we're at training camp, 
so I want to concentrate on that. Even if training's 
over, I don't want to lose focus.
data.name: Uma Musume A
data.processed:
󠁿I want to go but…… we're at training camp, 
󠁿so I want to concentrate on that. Even if training's 
󠁿over, I don't want to lose focus.

data.text:
Right. There's only a little time 
left at camp…… yeah, let's do our best!
data.name: Uma Musume B
data.processed:
󠁿Right. There's only a little time 
󠁿left at camp…… yeah, let's do our best!

data.text:
――And that's what happened. I want to go and have some fun but, 
everyone's working hard so it didn't feel right to ask them……
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Then, should I go with you?

data.processed:
󠁿――And that's what happened. I want to go and have some fun but, 
󠁿everyone's working hard so it didn't feel right to ask them……

data.text:
But, Trainer-san, aren't you really busy? Like, 
preparing for training, and how you're always with me――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿But, Trainer-san, aren't you really busy? Like, 
󠁿preparing for training, and how you're always with me――

data.text:
She felt apologetic so Hishi Miracle spoke in a small 
voice. I told her that she didn't need to hold back.

choices.text: To think you'd be trying to be considerate……
choices.processed: <size=36>To think you'd be trying to be considerate……</size>

data.processed:
󠁿She felt apologetic so Hishi Miracle spoke in a small 
󠁿voice. I told her that she didn't need to hold back.

data.text:
Wai- what do you mean by that!? 
Usually, I'm a considerate girl though!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Wai- what do you mean by that!? 
󠁿Usually, I'm a considerate girl though!?

data.text:
Haaa. Whatever~. In that case, I won't hold 
back. I'll have Trainer-san accompany me.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa. Whatever~. In that case, I won't hold 
󠁿back. I'll have Trainer-san accompany me.

data.text: Ah, but.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Ah, but.

data.text:
Well…… since we have the chance, rather than the festival…… 
just for today, do you want to try something special?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Well…… since we have the chance, rather than the festival…… 
󠁿just for today, do you want to try something special?

data.text:
Hmmmm~, they don't seem to be here, huh…… I 
guess the fireflies were just a rumor after all.
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: We probably shouldn't go much further

data.processed:
󠁿Hmmmm~, they don't seem to be here, huh…… I 
󠁿guess the fireflies were just a rumor after all.

data.text:
You're right. Sorry about that. I didn't even 
really know the location and brought you along.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿You're right. Sorry about that. I didn't even 
󠁿really know the location and brought you along.

data.text:
(I just wanted to show them scenery that was 
out of the ordinary…… Is this what happens 
when you do something you're not used to~?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(I just wanted to show them scenery that was 
󠁿out of the ordinary…… Is this what happens 
󠁿when you do something you're not used to~?)

data.text:
Haaa, that's unfortunate. I thought 
it'd be a good way to show my gratitude.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Haaa, that's unfortunate. I thought 
󠁿it'd be a good way to show my gratitude.

data.text: Ah…… did I say that out loud?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Ah…… did I say that out loud?

data.text:
Uhh~~~……well, you see. It's just something 
that I've been thinking about for a while now.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Uhh~~~……well, you see. It's just something 
󠁿that I've been thinking about for a while now.

data.text:
See, Trainer-san, when it comes to races…… you 
always have really high expectations for me, right?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿See, Trainer-san, when it comes to races…… you 
󠁿always have really high expectations for me, right?

data.text:
And, I just want to live up to those expectations, you 
see. At least, that's what I've been thinking anyways……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿And, I just want to live up to those expectations, you 
󠁿see. At least, that's what I've been thinking anyways……

data.text:
But if it's just this, I really wonder if it 
matches up to Trainer-san's passion. That's 
what I've been thinking and it made me worry.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿But if it's just this, I really wonder if it 
󠁿matches up to Trainer-san's passion. That's 
󠁿what I've been thinking and it made me worry.

data.text:
At the very least, with this I could repay 
that favor a little bit…… is what I had hoped, 
but as you can see, things didn't work out.
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: I'm happy you feel that way

data.processed:
󠁿At the very least, with this I could repay 
󠁿that favor a little bit…… is what I had hoped, 
󠁿but as you can see, things didn't work out.

data.text:
Ahaha. Since it's Trainer-san, I figured you'd say that. 
For my part, I haven't been thinking too deeply about it.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha. Since it's Trainer-san, I figured you'd say that. 
󠁿For my part, I haven't been thinking too deeply about it.

data.text:
The next time there's an opportunity, let me repay 
the favor. It's fine if you don't think too 
deeply and just think of it as a simple thanks.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿The next time there's an opportunity, let me repay 
󠁿the favor. It's fine if you don't think too 
󠁿deeply and just think of it as a simple thanks.

data.text: (……But well, it is a bit unfortunate though.)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(……But well, it is a bit unfortunate though.)

data.text:
(With how vast the sky is, it kind of feels 
special after all. If it all ended with us 
seeing fireflies I would have felt better too)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(With how vast the sky is, it kind of feels 
󠁿special after all. If it all ended with us 
󠁿seeing fireflies I would have felt better too)

data.text:
She didn't seem to be that depressed. ……But, it probably 
wasn't wrong to think she was a little disappointed.
data.processed:
󠁿She didn't seem to be that depressed. ……But, it probably 
󠁿wasn't wrong to think she was a little disappointed.

data.text:
She really didn't need to thank me. Just 
hearing that she was trying to respond 
to my expectations was more than enough.

choices.text: Then, I wonder what I'll have you do!

data.processed:
󠁿She really didn't need to thank me. Just 
󠁿hearing that she was trying to respond 
󠁿to my expectations was more than enough.

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Add more training time? Or maybe――

data.processed: 󠁿Eh?

data.text:
No no no! 
I said if there was another opportunity, didn't I!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿No no no! 
󠁿I said if there was another opportunity, didn't I!?

data.text:
Besides, would that even count as a thank you!? 
I'd do that anyways, if I needed to.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Besides, would that even count as a thank you!? 
󠁿I'd do that anyways, if I needed to.

data.text:
Hishi Miracle let out a small laugh. 
It seems like she understood that I was just joking.
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle let out a small laugh. 
󠁿It seems like she understood that I was just joking.

data.text:
――She really didn't need to match up to my passion. 
But, if she wants to run, and starts to want to win……
data.processed:
󠁿――She really didn't need to match up to my passion. 
󠁿But, if she wants to run, and starts to want to win……

data.text:
If she wants to do her best to match those expectations, 
then naturally, I'll support her.

choices.text: Wanna run all the way back to school?
choices.processed: <size=43>Wanna run all the way back to school?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿If she wants to do her best to match those expectations, 
󠁿then naturally, I'll support her.

data.text:
Wouldn't that mean you'd be coming with me, Trainer-san? 
I think it'd be rough, even with a bicycle though.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Wouldn't that mean you'd be coming with me, Trainer-san? 
󠁿I think it'd be rough, even with a bicycle though.

data.text:
Geez, you're real quick to start fooling around. I did 
think we were having a serious conversation, you know~?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Geez, you're real quick to start fooling around. I did 
󠁿think we were having a serious conversation, you know~?

data.text: Hmm……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm……

data.text: I-I wouldn't say that……
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿I-I wouldn't say that……

data.text:
C'mon! That's an exaggeration! 
I sleep at night just fine!!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿C'mon! That's an exaggeration! 
󠁿I sleep at night just fine!!

data.text:
Haa. Trainer-san you're not worried about this 
at all……the difference in passion. Doesn't 
it make me look like an idiot for worrying about it?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Haa. Trainer-san you're not worried about this 
󠁿at all……the difference in passion. Doesn't 
󠁿it make me look like an idiot for worrying about it?

data.text:
After letting out a deep breath and relaxing, 
Hishi Miracle turned to me with a smile. Even 
if there is a difference, it's not a bad thing.
data.processed:
󠁿After letting out a deep breath and relaxing, 
󠁿Hishi Miracle turned to me with a smile. Even 
󠁿if there is a difference, it's not a bad thing.

data.text:
Compared to other trainers and their Uma Musume, it 
really was a little different. But, even then――
data.processed:
󠁿Compared to other trainers and their Uma Musume, it 
󠁿really was a little different. But, even then――

data.text:
We can just do our best together. We don't 
need to be that concerned. It's fine, we 
can still move forward together.
data.processed:
󠁿We can just do our best together. We don't 
󠁿need to be that concerned. It's fine, we 
󠁿can still move forward together.

data.text: ……That's…… yeah. You're right.
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Let's try going a little further

data.processed: 󠁿……That's…… yeah. You're right.

data.text:
Eh? What's this all of a sudden? 
Wai- Trainer-san! It's way too dark over there――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? What's this all of a sudden? 
󠁿Wai- Trainer-san! It's way too dark over there――

data.text:
We only proceeded a little bit further. 
But when we did, while looking up through the trees――
data.processed:
󠁿We only proceeded a little bit further. 
󠁿But when we did, while looking up through the trees――

data.text:
Oh…… the stars, amazing…… they seem so close…… 
even though all we did was move to a different spot.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Oh…… the stars, amazing…… they seem so close…… 
󠁿even though all we did was move to a different spot.

data.text:
……If I was alone, I would have missed it. I wouldn't 
have been able to see well, and I'd be a little 
worried…… I don't think I would have made it here.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……If I was alone, I would have missed it. I wouldn't 
󠁿have been able to see well, and I'd be a little 
󠁿worried…… I don't think I would have made it here.

data.text:
I thought…… once again, just like normal, the 
day would end without seeing the fireflies 
or without anything special happening.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I thought…… once again, just like normal, the 
󠁿day would end without seeing the fireflies 
󠁿or without anything special happening.

data.text:
…… But…… because of Trainer-san, 
I was able to experience something a little special.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿…… But…… because of Trainer-san, 
󠁿I was able to experience something a little special.

data.text: ……Could this mean that something similar could happen again?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……Could this mean that something similar could happen again?

data.text:
……Let's try to keep things within reason, okay? 
I'm used to being 『Normal』, after all. ……Otherwise――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……Let's try to keep things within reason, okay? 
󠁿I'm used to being 『Normal』, after all. ……Otherwise――

data.text: ――I might get so surprised that I end up crying.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿――I might get so surprised that I end up crying.

data.text:
She said keeping things within reason―― but, 
in those eyes was eagerness. In that case, 
I couldn't help but want to respond to that.
data.processed:
󠁿She said keeping things within reason―― but, 
󠁿in those eyes was eagerness. In that case, 
󠁿I couldn't help but want to respond to that.
